description:
Search out the best lines without sore, sweaty feet. Underfoot and shin cushioning pad the hard hitting zones, and fine-gauge merino provides warmth without bulk and has natural antimicrobial properties.

  • Made of fine-gauge knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit
  • All weather performance for warmth in winter, yet cool enough for spring turns
  • True Seamless™ construction makes them irresistibly comfortable
  • High-density cushioning underfoot and on the shin for comfort in ski boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Aurora Lightweight with Cushion OTC Socks - Women's
